vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H4812G', 'matchingForm': 'מְרָיוֹת', 'stepTransliteration': 'me.ra.vot', 'gloss': 'Meraioth', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.6.6-Neh.11.11', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '米拉約', '_es_Gloss': 'Meraioth', '_zh_Gloss': '米拉约'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4812H', 'matchingForm': 'מְרָיוֹת', 'stepTransliteration': 'me.ra.vot', 'gloss': 'Meraioth', '_searchResultRange': 'Neh.12.15@Ezra.8.33-Neh.12.15', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '米拉約', '_es_Gloss': 'Meraioth', '_zh_Gloss': '米拉约'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4822H', 'matchingForm': 'מְרֵמוֹת', 'stepTransliteration': 'me.re.mot', 'gloss': 'Meremoth', '_searchResultRange': 'Ezra.10.36', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '米利末', '_es_Gloss': 'Meremoth', '_zh_Gloss': '米利末'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.8.33;
son of: Uriah (H0223H); also called Meraioth at Neh.12.15;
Also named: me.ra.vot (מְרָיוֹת "Meraioth" H4812H)
§ Meremoth = "elevations"
1) a priest, son of Uriah of the family of Koz active in rebuilding the wall of Jerusalem and in the 7th course of temple service in the time of Ezra and Nehemiah
2) a priest in the time of Zerubbabel
3) a returning exile of the family of Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Urías; sacerdote; post exílico; (b)   hombre; casado con una esposa extranjera; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米利末 这个複數 陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "提升"
1) 以斯拉和尼希米時代的一位祭司, 哈哥斯家族的烏利亞的兒子, 他曾參與重建城牆
的工作, 並負責聖殿第七班服事的工作 (拉 8:33;尼 3:4)
2) 所羅巴伯時的一位祭司
3) 以斯拉時巴尼家族的一位由被擄地回歸的成員, 他曾娶了一外邦女子為妻 (拉 10:36)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
米利末 这个复数 阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "提升"
1) 以斯拉和尼希米时代的一位祭司, 哈哥斯家族的乌利亚的儿子, 他曾参与重建城墙
的工作, 并负责圣殿第七班服事的工作 (拉 8:33;尼 3:4)
2) 所罗巴伯时的一位祭司
3) 以斯拉时巴尼家族的一位由被掳地回归的成员, 他曾娶了一外邦女子为妻 (拉 10:36)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.36
§ Meremoth = "elevations"
1) a priest, son of Uriah of the family of Koz active in rebuilding the wall of Jerusalem and in the 7th course of temple service in the time of Ezra and Nehemiah
2) a priest in the time of Zerubbabel
3) a returning exile of the family of Bani who had a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
